id.description: Uniquely identifies this customer service record

phone_number.description: The phone number of the customer service record.

status.description: The status of the customer service record

error_message.description: The error message in case status is `failed`. This field would be null in case of `pending` or `completed` status.

result.description: The result of the CSR request. This field would be null in case of `pending` or `failed` status.

carrier_name.description: The name of the carrier that the customer service record is for.

associated_phone_numbers.description: The associated phone numbers of the customer service record.

admin.description: The admin of the customer service record.

name.description: The name of the customer service record.

billing_phone_number.description: The billing phone number of the customer service record.

account_number.description: The account number of the customer service record.

authorized_person_name.description: The authorized person name of the customer service record.

address.description: The address of the customer service record

postal_code.description: The zip code of the address

record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
